decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p>All new external facing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: In order to respect the appearance of the host property and wider terrace.&nbsp;</p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-570748b4-7fff-f695-3827-2db7f71dd598">A scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the lightwell against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. Mitigation measures may include providing suitable drainage, threshold levels and sump pump where required in the lightwell.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-570748b4-7fff-f695-3827-2db7f71dd598"><br></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-570748b4-7fff-f695-3827-2db7f71dd598">REASON: In order to reduce the risk of flooding.</span></p>

<p><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">Prior to the commencement of development full particulars of a Sustainable Urban Drainage System (</span><span class="il" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">SuDS</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">), including the following, must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. a) Details of a&nbsp;</span><span class="il" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">SuDS</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">&nbsp;that achieves a 50% betterment in surface water run-off rates compared to the existing run-off rates. b) A detailed scheme for the ownership and maintenance for every element of the surface water drainage system proposed on the site. c) A strategy which demonstrates how any&nbsp;</span><span class="il" style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">SuDS</span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">&nbsp;and/or attenuation features will be suitably maintained for the lifetime of the development. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved</span><b style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">&nbsp;</b></p><p><b style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;"><br></b></p><p><b style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">REASON:&nbsp;</b><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;">To ensure that the development will provide a sustainable drainage system to prevent surface water flooding.</span><br></p>
description: Excavation of existing basement and creation of front light well including the installation of new railings and gates to front.
